articles.description: IPL 2022: While there is plenty of time left to identify the core group of players heading into the World Cup, former India captain Sunil Gavaskar has identified a player he feels can be an 'automatic pick' in the T20 WC. | Cricket
articles.content: The T20 World Cup is seven months away and the IPL will go a long way in determining who all make the cut for the flight to Australia. The T20 World Cup promises to be a huge tournament for India, no… [+2383 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Nigeria supporters storm pitch, riot after team misses out on World Cup qualification - ESPN
articles.description: Nigeria fans stormed the pitch and police had to disperse them with tear gas after their team failed to reach the World Cup after a draw with Ghana.
articles.content: Nigeria fans stormed the pitch as the fallout from their surprise failure to reach the World Cup finals started immediately after the final whistle of Tuesday's 1-1 home playoff draw with Ghana in Ab… [+1376 chars]

articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: While Ronaldo, Messi and Lewandowski make World Cup, Qatar will miss peak talents Salah and Haaland - ESPN India
articles.description: The World Cup in Qatar will be a party, but it's hard not to wonder how much more fun it'd be with the likes of Italy or Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
articles.content: PORTO, Portugal -- Cristiano Ronaldo is heading to Qatar, but Mohamed Salah isn't and neither is Zlatan Ibrahimovic, whose dream of becoming the first outfield player to bridge a 16-year gap between … [+4797 chars]

articles.title: Kylian Mbappe scores twice for France, Netherlands hold Germany, Norway hit nine, Spain and Italy win - Eurosport UK
